name: BlissfulOceanWaves
0:
”Alexa, open blissful ocean waves”
”Alexa, start blissful ocean waves”
”Alexa, launch blissful ocean waves”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blissful ocean waves
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with the sound of Ocean Waves entering your room. 
This simple to use app plays continuous high quality ocean wave sounds for as long as you like. 
Create the perfect ambiance for sleep, work, study, meditation, and soothing baby. 

Just simply say “Alexa, open Blissful Ocean Waves”
To stop just say “Alexa, Stop”
To pause just say “Alexa, Pause”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
